artist: Painter: After Caspar Netscher; Lithographer: Gustav Wolff
description: a young woman holding a piece of paper and leaning on a window-sill, singing; a young man playing a lute next to her; both seen through a window in an arched composition
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: Gemalt von Caspar Netscher   Lithogr. G.  Wolff / DIE SÄNGERIN / (Dresdener Galerie) / 42 | in pencil on sheet: 2-125
title: The Singer
